page.title: Home
page.p: ASAP plays Atari 8-bit chiptunes on modern computers and mobile devices. It emulates the POKEY sound chip and the 6502 processor.
ASAP is free software, you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
Get ASAP for Android, Windows, macOS, Linux or run right in your web browser. On iOS, ASAP is integrated into Modizer.
You can listen to Atari SAP Music Archive (ASMA) which is a collection of over 8000 songs with over 200 hours of total playback time. Enjoy!
